tool.name: Scater calculate cpm
tool.description: Calculate CPM from serialized scater R object

param.name: R_scater_serialized
param.help: File name in which a serialized R SingleCellExperiment object where object matrix found

param.name: size_factors
param.label: use size factors
param.help: A logical scalar indicating whether size factors in object should be used to compute effective library sizes. If not, all size factors are deleted and librarysize-based factors are used instead (seelibrarySizeFactors. Alternatively, anumeric vector containing a size factor for each cell, which is used in place ofsizeFactor(object).

data.name: R_scater_cpm
data.help: File name in which to store serialized R object of type Scater

data.name: cpm_matrix
data.help: File name in which to store CPM values.

tool.help:
Usage: scater-calculate-cpm.R [options]
Options: -i INPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --input-object-file=INPUT-OBJECT-FILE
-s SIZE-FACTORS, --size-factors=SIZE-FACTORS
-o OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --output-object-file=OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE
-t OUTPUT-TEXT-FILE, --output-text-file=OUTPUT-TEXT-FILE
